snippet.title: Viva Hexagon! Feat. Ipulo |  Gameplay Trailer.
snippet.description:
A compilation of gameplay from my new open-source platform puzzle game, "Viva Hexagon! Feat. Ipulo"

You can play the game in browser on it's official pages on Newgrounds or itch.io, or download the local client from itch.io or the Gitlab page.

Play the game in your browser here!
https://zeddy1267.itch.io/vivagon
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/project/4879369


Check out the soundtrack on bandcamp!
https://vivagon.bandcamp.com/album/sounds-of-hexagon


The game's source code can be accessed on Gitlab.
https://gitlab.com/zeddy1267/vivagon


 ptojrvy-6000
